author: Home Repair Tutor
description:
This video shares subfloor repair mistakes to avoid and what to do instead. For more tips, visit homerepairtutor.com 

Many thanks to Great Stuff for providing the Subfloor Construction Adhesive for this video. Great Stuff is also a sponsor of Home Repair Tutor. 

#howto #diy #bathroomremodel   

Subfloor Repair Mistakes to Avoid
0:01 How to remove the toilet closet flange
0:19 How to cut out old subfloor
1:12 How to add blocking under the subfloor
1:56 How to use Great Stuff Construction Adhesive
3:04 How to cut a hole in the subfloor for the toilet flange

These supplies were used in our video:
-Great Stuff Construction Adhesive
-Makita Drill and 5-inch Hole Saw
-Ironclad Command Gloves
-Circular Saw with Diablo Plywood Blade
-Oscillating Multi-Tool 

Want our newest DIY videos? Subscribe to our channel and hit the notification bell to see every upload. We upload new videos every Saturday.

Disclaimer:
Videos produced by Home Repair Tutor are provided for informational, educational,
title: Subfloor Repair Mistakes to Avoid (Don't Let Your Floors FAIL!)

author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Subfloor repair tips…I had to replace the damaged plywood in this bathroom. After removing the old section, I used Great Stuff Construction Adhesive on the I-Joists to reduce squeaks and strengthen the repair. Then I used 2” construction screws to fasten the plywood. Many thanks to @greatstufffoam  for sponsoring this tutorial and making products that improve home improvement projects 🔥
title: Toilet Subfloor Repair Tips - #shorts #homerepairtutor #brandpartner
